item.description:
It's that time of year once again!

We will be hosting a fantastic and cruelty-free Thanksliving meal that is open to anyone who wants to avoid that turkey on the table, the family stress of the holidays or just wants to eat some delicious vegan food with friends from the community. This will be a potluck style meal so please bring your favorite vegan side dish or dessert!

Bring your friends, family, games etc. We'll start compiling a list of dishes people are bringing so we don't end up with 10 sides of mashed potatoes so please let me know what you plan on bringing when you RSVP.If you need any ideas or recipes, those can be provided as well.
item.name: Vegan Thanksliving Day Potluck Celebration!
